features: Keep Your Floor Clean: The design of raised particles on the door mat helps to scrape dirt and debris off the shoes, and the concave part can collect sand and gravel. Pets can also walk on it. Sole, claw bottom clean can keep the floor clean greatly.

Anti Slip Design: The concave hole design at the bottom of the outdoor mat can increase friction. It is made of silicone with strong adsorption. It also has enough weight. There is no need to worry about the potential safety hazard caused by the sliding of the floor mat!

Easy to Clean and Fast Dry: The Hreasky indoor door mat is made of silicone. No odor, no crease, no deformation, no tear when exposed for a long time, and more durable than other materials. , the neat appearance of the entrance mat enhances the appearance level of the facade.

Multi-scene Applications: Front door, entryway, lobby, patio, garage, kitchen, laundry, pet food mat. We advise customers to measure their area before purchasing. The dimensions of our doormats are 30 ""L x 17"" W. The floor mat is only 0.4"" H and will not block the opening of the door.
Secure Service: We attach great importance to customer experience. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. Hreasky has a professional after-sales team to solve your worries.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We choose to use safe and odorless Silicone Material that will not wrinkle and deform. Quick drying results in No odor and more Durable. Efficiently Collect Sand And Dust From Soles Just scrape it gently on the door mat, the sand on the sole will automatically fall off to the mat, Just 2 seconds! The concave hole design on the back makes the door mat not easy to move and has a strong grip. Even if there is a typhoon, the door mat is difficult to be blown away by the strong wind.

Tips 1. Since the silicone material is waterproof, it does not absorb water. The sewage will stay on the surface of the mat, and the water droplets will slide off the mat by gently shaking the mat. 2. Please do not put the mat on the wet floor, please make sure your floor is dry, otherwise the mat may slip easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these Matt’s for my garage. They really pick up the grass, mud and sand from your shoes. This mat has made a huge difference in keeping my floors clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works well. Leaves and dirt fall into mat.
reviews.reviewText: My dog at first wouldn’t walk on it. The reason I purchased so it would eliminate the leaves and grass the dog brought in. Dog just needed to get used to it. Took over 2 weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a great litter mat
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use as a doormat, but then I got thinking it might make a good litterbox mat and it does! I had to work a bit with my cats to get them to walk on it but they accepted it pretty quickly. It does the best job of anything I've ever tried of trapping the litter that gets out of the box so that it can't scatter across the floor. Then it's easy to shake it out. You need to be careful picking it up because it's so floppy but the debris shakes right out of it. Now and again I hose it off. Super easy to clean. The only thing is that it's a bit narrow as a litter mat. I use it with the narrow end at the box opening. For now I have a real litter mat under it as a backup but I barely need to shake that one off since this works so well. It would be great if the manufacturers would consider making a wider version. But even as it is it's good and I most likely will buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hreasky Silicone Indoor Door Mat: Looks good, does what it is supposed to do - Highly Recommend
reviews.reviewText: Hreasky Silicone Indoor Door MatWe have been looking for an indoor mat that we could also use for the snowy days in Illinois. This door mat is perfect for that.It looks good, is easy to clean, and even the dirt from the bottom of our shoes gets caught in the little nubs of the rug.This has decreased the amount of clean-up time I have to spend in the sun room, and I really appreciate that.I love, love this mat and will purchase again, if I have to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than the picture
reviews.reviewText: The product appears a lot smaller than the picture, very light material, but very stable and does its job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mat catches a lot of water and debris that my dog tends to bring in after being outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t slide and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Love how easy this is clean. Seems to catch a lot of dirt at my front door but it stays in the mat. Doesn’t slide much at all, and is comfy to stand on. Easy to shake out, but my vacuum will clean it easily too. Going to buy more for my kitchen sink and Christmas presents!
